deck.name: Midnight Slash
deck.description: Attack.  Shift to the opposite space of the target you attacked.  Repeat this process. (Checkers)

deck.name: Ancestors Guide Me
deck.description: Defend.  On your next turn, draw 3 cards.

deck.name: Hidden Tunnel
deck.description: Shift to any black space on the board.  Defend 2.

deck.name: Blade of the Grandfather (1)
deck.description: Equip.  Your basic attack is 3.  If you are in a corner space, your basic attack is 5.

deck.name: Master of Shadows (1)
deck.description: Move to a corner of the board.  Attack 4.  Repeat this process for each corner.

deck.name: Clan Assault (1)
deck.description: Attack all enemy heroes on black spaces.
